name: TShift
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
TShift, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: TShift).
Shifts voxel time series from input so that separate slices are aligned to the same temporal origin.
For complete details, see the `3dTshift Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dTshift.html>`_

inputs.name: Ignore
inputs.description: Ignore the first set of points specified.

inputs.name: Interp
inputs.description: 'fourier' or 'linear' or 'cubic' or 'quintic' or 'heptic'. Different interpolation methods (see 3dtshift for details) default = fourier.

inputs.name: Rlt
inputs.description: Before shifting, remove the mean and linear trend.

inputs.name: Rltplus
inputs.description: Before shifting, remove the mean and linear trend and later put back the mean.

inputs.name: Slice encoding direction
inputs.description: 'k' or 'k-'. Direction in which slice_timing is specified (default: k). if negative,slice_timing is defined in reverse order, that is, the first entry corresponds to the slice with the largest index, and the final entry corresponds to slice index zero. only in effect when slice_timing is passed as list, not when it is passed as file.

inputs.name: Slice timing
inputs.description: file or string or a list of items which are a float. Time offsets from the volume acquisition onset for each slice.

inputs.name: Slice timing
inputs.description: file or string or a list of items which are a float. Time offsets from the volume acquisition onset for each slice.

inputs.name: Tpattern
inputs.description: 'alt+z' or 'altplus' or 'alt+z2' or 'alt-z' or 'altminus' or 'alt-z2' or 'seq+z' or 'seqplus' or 'seq-z' or 'seqminus' or a string. Use specified slice time pattern rather than one in header.

inputs.name: Tpattern
inputs.description: 'alt+z' or 'altplus' or 'alt+z2' or 'alt-z' or 'altminus' or 'alt-z2' or 'seq+z' or 'seqplus' or 'seq-z' or 'seqminus' or a string. Use specified slice time pattern rather than one in header.

inputs.name: Tr
inputs.description: Manually set the tr. you can attach suffix "s" for seconds or "ms" for milliseconds.

inputs.name: Tslice
inputs.description: Align each slice to time offset of given slice.

inputs.name: Tzero
inputs.description: Align each slice to given time offset.

output-files.name: Timing file
output-files.description: Afni formatted timing file, if ``slice_timing`` is a list.
